child.name: A maximum of three courses may be taught entirely in English.
(b) At least one course must be completed in each of the following historical periods:

At least four upper-division courses required for the minor must be completed successfully at UCI, of which a maximum of two may be taught entirely in English. By petition, two of the four may be taken through the UC Education Abroad Program, providing course content is approved in advance by the appropriate department Undergraduate Director.
